column2: 你最近并不谨慎——频繁而多次地使用[Root.Society.GetName]的力量，毫不考虑保密。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] 们为此已经开始公开指控你的叛教行为!
此人被指为叛教，这种指控是否属实就是另一回事了...
用这个机会报复你的仇敌，指控 [rival_target.GetHerHim] 是个叛教者. §Y[rival_target.GetBestName]§! 或许并没有罪过，但你的领主无论如何不会更聪明...
你将 §Y[accused_apostate.GetBestName]§! 带到了 §Y[Root.Liege.GetTitle] [Root.Liege.GetFirstName]§!的宫廷, [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] 将决定这叛教者的命运!

在采取了大量目击者的陈述，并密切考察了 [accused_apostate.GetHerHis]一举一动之后, 你掌握了足够而确凿的证据来指控 [accused_apostate.GetBestName] 是叛教者—— [accused_apostate.GetSheHe] 明显地效忠于 [accused_apostate.Society.GetName]! 你的 [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] 准备好了把 [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] 绑来你的面前.

在采取了大量目击者的陈述，并密切考察了 [accused_apostate.GetHerHis]一举一动之后, 你成功收集到刚好足够的证据来指控 [accused_apostate.GetBestName] 是叛教者—— [accused_apostate.GetSheHe] 一直同 [accused_apostate.Society.GetName] 相勾结! 你的 [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] 准备好了把 [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] 绑来你的面前.

在监视[accused_apostate.GetBestName]的时候你发现了大量的异端书籍和道具. 这些加在一起，现在你有了足够而确凿的证据来指控 [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] 是叛教者—— [accused_apostate.GetSheHeCap] 自称是一个虔诚的[accused_apostate.Religion.GetName], 但[accused_apostate.GetSheHe]显然在说谎——[accused_apostate.GetSheHe] 一直秘密地修习 [accused_apostate.GetTrueReligionAdherent]! 你的 [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] 已准备好把 [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] 绑来你面前.

在采取了一些儿童和关心的农民的口述之后, 你收集到一些证据指向 [accused_apostate.GetBestName] 的叛教—— 你敏锐地觉察到 [accused_apostate.GetFirstName]的灵魂已经受到 [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]玷污! 你的 [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] 准备好了把 [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] 绑来你的面前.

在采取了一些儿童和关心的农民的口述之后, 你收集到一些证据指向 [accused_apostate.GetBestName] 的叛教—— 你敏锐地觉察到 [accused_apostate.GetFirstName]的灵魂已经受到 [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]玷污! 你的 [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] 准备好了把 [accused_apostate.GetHerHim] 绑来你的面前.
抓住[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]! [accused_apostate.GetSheHeCap] 将会受到 [Root.Liege.GetTitle] [Root.Liege.GetFirstName]的审判.
我知道我更应该指控谁...

[Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName] 冲进你的 [Root.GetChamber], 身侧有几名 [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] 拖来了带着枷锁的 [accused_apostate.GetBestName]. "我的 [Root.GetTitle], 这[accused_apostate.GetManWoman]公开承认了[accused_apostate.GetSheHe]对 [accused_apostate.Society.GetName]的忠诚! 我们该怎么处理[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]?"

[Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName] 冲进你的[Root.GetChamber], 身侧有几名 [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] 拖来了带着枷锁的 [accused_apostate.GetBestName]. "我的[Root.GetTitle], 我搜罗了无可辩驳的证据证明这[accused_apostate.GetManWoman]同 [accused_apostate.Society.GetName]相勾结! 我们该怎么处理[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]?"

[Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName] 冲进你的[Root.GetChamber], 身侧有几名 [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] 拖来了带着枷锁的 [accused_apostate.GetBestName]. "我的[Root.GetTitle], 我们在这叛教者阅读[accused_apostate.TrueReligion.GetName] [accused_apostate.GetTrueReligionScriptureName], 以及向 [accused_apostate.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]献上赞美的时候抓住了[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]! 我们该怎么处理[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]?"

[Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName]冲进你的[Root.GetChamber], flanked by several [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] dragging [accused_apostate.GetBestName] with them in chains. "My [Root.GetTitle], there are many concerned peasants claiming that their children are plagued by nightmares of this [accused_apostate.GetManWoman] - [accused_apostate.GetSheHe] is obviously a [accused_apostate.GetWarlockWitch]! What shall be done with [accused_apostate.GetHerHim]?"

[Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName]冲进你的[Root.GetChamber], flanked by several [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] dragging [accused_apostate.GetBestName] with them in chains. "My [Root.GetTitle], there are many concerned peasants claiming that their children are plagued by nightmares of this [accused_apostate.GetManWoman] - [accused_apostate.GetSheHe] is obviously a [accused_apostate.GetWarlockWitch]! What shall be done with [accused_apostate.GetHerHim]?"
让[accused_apostate.GetHerHim]走吧, 这能有什么害处?

那悖时砍脑壳的[my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName], [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]! [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap]和[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis]那伙[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]闯进我的[Root.GetChamber]，捆了我，还说我叛教. 现在[my_liege.GetBestName]要把我活活烧死!

那悖时砍脑壳的[my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName], [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]! [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap]和[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis]那伙[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]闯进我的[Root.GetChamber]，捆了我，还说我叛教. 现在[my_liege.GetBestName]要我烂在[my_liege.GetHerHis]地牢里!
我早晚会放出来的，那时你等着瞧!

诅咒那该死的[my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName], [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]! [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap]和[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis]那一群[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]闯入了我的[Root.GetChamber]，给我套上枷锁, 指控我叛教. 幸运的是[my_liege.GetBestName]决定我可以自由—— 尽管我将被打上叛教者的烙印.
从某种意义上说，很幸运.

那悖时砍脑壳的[my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName], [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]! [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetSheHeCap]和[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis]那伙[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]闯进我的[Root.GetChamber]，捆了我，还说我叛教. 谢天谢地，[my_liege.GetBestName]把我给放了—— [my_liege.GetFirstName]觉得我是清白的!

糟糕! 你在[Root.Society.GetName]的同行, [From.GetBestName], 让[my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]跟[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]给逮住了! 他们眼也不眨就把[From.GetHerHim]搁火上烧了...

糟糕! 你在[Root.Society.GetName]的同行, [From.GetBestName], 让[my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]跟[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]给逮住了! [From.GetSheHeCap]怕是要烂在[my_liege.GetTitle] [my_liege.GetFirstName]的牢里...

糟糕! 你在[Root.Society.GetName]的同行, [From.GetBestName], 让[my_liege.GetLordSpiritualName] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetFullName]跟[my_liege.job_spiritual.GetHerHis] [my_liege.job_spiritual.GetReligionWarriorPlural]给逮住了! They used hot irons to brand [From.GetFirstName] an apostate, fortunately they spared [From.GetHerHis] life...
It is a sign for me to lay low...
Your vile pantheon of gods have no power here, [From.GetBestName]!
Send emissaries from [From.Society.GetName] to the local population in order to convert them to the [From.Religion.GetName] faith.
Enables §Gright-clicking§! the title shield of a county to convert the local population to your religion.
A majority of the population in [From.GetName] has embraced the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.

A courier is brought before me with a message, telling me that [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has sent emissaries to [From.GetName] who have successfully managed to persuade the populace to embrace the [FromFrom.Religion.GetName] faith.

[Actor.GetBestName] is offering me a gift of [GetArtifactName].
Will you accept [GetArtifactName] as a humble gift?
I accept your gracious gift. What a splendid object!

Your warriors have looted, ravaged, pillaged and plundered [target_location.GetName] to such a degree that a Holding in the county has been completely devastated. Only empty ruins remain, haunted by the shades of the slain...

Catharism is a Gnostic sect centered around a dualistic doctrine. The Good Christians', as the Cathar faithful calls themselves, believe in two Gods - the good God who is the creator of the heavenly spiritual realm and the evil God who created the physical world with all its temptations and suffering.

Ever since its humble roots, Christians have marked themselves by their refusal to abandon their faith in the face of persecution. So it is that a rich tradition of martyrs and underground parishes can give hope to groups of believers in even the darkest of times, no matter what they are outwardly forced to profess. To each other they can profess their true faith in God, and their God is love.

So it is that a rich tradition of martyrs and underground parishes can give hope to groups of believers in even the darkest of times, no matter what they are outwardly forced to profess. To each other they can profess their true faith in God, and their God is love.

Ever since its humble roots, Christians have marked themselves by their refusal to abandon their faith in the face of persecution. So it is that a rich tradition of martyrs and underground parishes can give hope to groups of believers in even the darkest of times, no matter what they are outwardly forced to profess. To each other they can profess their true faith in God, and their God is love.

Bogomilism is a Gnostic sect centered around a dualistic doctrine. Its members believe in two Gods - the good God who is the creator of the heavenly spiritual realm and the evil God who created the physical world with all its temptations and suffering.

Seeing themselves as walking in the footsteps of the Apostles who first built the Church in the name of Christ, there are Christians who will not give up their faith, even when circumstance has forced them to renounce their words. They continue the good work, building their faith and their church, knowing in their hearts that they are doing God's will.

Seeing themselves as walking in the footsteps of the Apostles who first built the Church in the name of Christ, there are Christians who will not give up their faith, even when circumstance has forced them to renounce their words. They continue the good work, building their faith and their church, knowing in their hearts that they are doing God's will.

Paulicianism is a Gnostic sect centered around a dualistic doctrine. Its members believe in two Gods - the good God who is the creator of the heavenly spiritual realm and the evil God who created the physical world with all its temptations and suffering.

Seeing themselves as walking in the footsteps of the Apostles who first built the Church in the name of Christ, there are Christians who will not give up their faith, even when circumstance has forced them to renounce their words. They continue the good work, building their faith and their church, knowing in their hearts that they are doing God's will.

Seeing themselves as walking in the footsteps of the Apostles who first built the Church in the name of Christ, there are Christians who will not give up their faith, even when circumstance has forced them to renounce their words. They continue the good work, building their faith and their church, knowing in their hearts that they are doing God's will.

Seeing themselves as walking in the footsteps of the Apostles who first built the Church in the name of Christ, there are Christians who will not give up their faith, even when circumstance has forced them to renounce their words. They continue the good work, building their faith and their church, knowing in their hearts that they are doing God's will.

The Messalians, 'the ones who pray', are a Christian sect. They believe that perfection can only be attained by perceiving God as He reveals Himself to the carnal senses. To bring forth such revelations, the only path is prayer - neither the church, baptism or any other sacrament can drive the desires from the soul and invite God.
The Zikris follow the teachings of the Quran, believed to have been verbally recited to Muhammed by God. They will proclaim that Muhammed is chosen by God, as prophet and the first Imam.

The Yazidis believe that God created the world and tasked seven holy angels with its care. The first of the angels is the ambivalent Melek Taus, the Peacock Angel, a ruler who causes both good and bad to befall his mortal subjects.

The Druze follow the teachings of the Epistles of Wisdom, which includes the Old Testament, the Qur'an and the philosophical works by Plato. The faithful believe that God is the whole of existence, unlimited and omnipresent. To unite with the Cosmic Mind and reach ultimate happiness, a Druze must live through many successive reincarnations.

The Hurufi follow the teachings of the Quran, believed to have been verbally recited to Muhammed by God. They will proclaim that Muhammed is chosen by God, as prophet and the first Imam. They spread their belief that God, through Muhammed, chose Ali as his successor, and thus the first caliph of the state of Islam. They will stand by what they believe to be the true word of God.

The Ibadi faith is said to predate both the Sunni and Shia schools of Islam. There are several doctrinal differences between these later branches and the orthodox Ibadi, for examples, the Ibadi do not believe there has to be one leader for all of the Muslim communities. However, their fervent faith in Allah is the same.

The Khawariji follow the teachings of the Quran, believed to have been verbally recited to Muhammed by God. Unlike many other Muslim groups, they believe that any righteous and pious Muslim can become caliph, and that is is their duty to revolt against any ruler who deviates from their interpretation of Islam. Martyrdom and dying for Allah is a strong desire among the Khawariji.

The Samaritans believe that they follow the true religion of the Israelites, as it was before the Babylonian Captivity. Their tenants are similar to those of Judaism, but they have their own version of the Torah and pray facing Mount Gerizim, which they believe is the one true sanctuary chosen by God.

Hidden Karaite communities have organized under oppression ever since the time of the Babylonian captivity. These groups welcome both those forced to convert away of Judaism, the Anusim, and those who have secretly become righteous converts, the ger tzedek. A community always cares for its own, knowing that as ages pass, true faith is worth persevering for. God will provide.

The Mazdaki believe that there are two original principles of the universe - the good Light and the evil Darkness. By a cosmic accident, the two has been mixed, and everything is tainted but God. Mankind's purpose is to spread the wisdom of their benevolent God and releasing their own inner Light through good conduct and kind actions.

The Manicheans believe that there are two original principles of the universe - the good Light and the evil Darkness. By a cosmic accident, the two has been mixed, and everything is tainted but God. Mankind's purpose is to spread the wisdom of their benevolent God and releasing their own inner Light through good conduct and kind actions.

The faithful Aztecs bravely worship their high God, the warrior Huitzilopochtli, despite being surrounded by enemies on every side. If they stay true and send him human sacrifices as gifts, he will lead them to a new dawn, a glorious conquest of fire and blood.

The faithful Aztecs bravely worship their high God, the warrior Huitzilopochtli, despite being surrounded by enemies on every side. If they stay true and send him human sacrifices as gifts, he will lead them to a new dawn, a glorious conquest of fire and blood.
All power comes at a price. The use of dark magic has corrupted this character's body, making it frail and susceptible to disease.
All power comes at a price. The use of dark magic has corrupted this character's body, making it frail and susceptible to disease.
I knew power had its price, yet I never anticipated this...

The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. Now the dark tendrils of [Root.GetDWDevil]'s magic has invaded my mind, sapping my energy and resolve. I am haunted by anxious thoughts and sleep eludes me.

I can feel it, it is inside of me! The mesmerizing voice, the sweet touch of my dark saviour! [Root.GetDWDevil]'s gift, the beautiful magic, is flowing freely through my veins. The sensation is dizzying, radiant, breathtaking. Nothing in the world can stop me now!
[Root.GetDWDevil]! Whisper your wishes in my ear and they shall come true!
The use of dark magic has corrupted you.\n

The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. The dark tendrils of [Root.GetDWDevil]'s magic has invaded my mouth and twisted around my tongue. As I attempt to speak, my words fail me, making social interaction awkward and the casting of spells tedious and draining.

The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. What was first the lightest of limps has now turned into a hideous deformity. When I rub my sore, twisted ankles, I can feel the darkness pulsing just under my skin...

The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. Little by little, my spine has curved itself forward, pushing my head down towards the ground. It is as if the dark magic has twisted me away from the heavens so that I am always facing [Root.GetDWDevil].

The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. At first, I thought the lines and blotches on my face were a temporary consequence of too many nightly adventures and too little sleep. Now I barely recognize myself in the mirror.

The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. Now the dark tendrils of [Root.GetDWDevil]'s magic has invaded my body, sapping my energy and causing all sorts of aches and ailments. I cannot remember the last day when I was not sniveling, coughing or retching.

The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. Now the dark tendrils of [Root.GetDWDevil]'s magic has invaded my body, sapping my energy and causing all sorts of aches and ailments. No matter how long I sleep, I never feel quite rested.

The corruption crept up on me so slowly - I did not realize what was happening to me before it was too late. Now the dark tendrils of [Root.GetDWDevil]'s magic has invaded my body, sapping all of my energy and strength. I often feel as if I am starving, yet I struggle to keep my food down...

I place the bowl before me and wait for the water to be perfectly still. A regular scrying would allow me to choose a focus for my thoughts  on the other hand, I could use something from my shelves of alchemy in order to create something unseen before... The reflection on the water ripples as I let out a deep breath.

There is something annoyingly pompous in the speech of [fellow_member_target.GetTitledFirstName]  when did [fellow_member_target.GetSheHe] become an expert on [Root.GetHermeticDebateSubject]?\nSighing, I close my hand around the vial in my pocket.
I should concoct something to relax me, or help me focus even!
I have some interesting flasks that could aid us!
Calm down, child. I'll brew something with a hint of [GetSelectedIngredient_1].
Don't fret, child. I'll make you some broth from [GetSelectedIngredient_1].
Hush, child. This [GetSelectedIngredient_1] infused potion will help.
Hush, child. I'll make you something, from... Uh, this [GetSelectedIngredient_1].

I'll make it up to you! Let us share some broth from [GetSelectedIngredient_1].

Well... Would you care for some experiential [GetSelectedIngredient_1] infused beer I've made?

My fellow members of the Order sometimes speak of intricate charms and recipes to ward off evil, and perhaps I should take precautions too. Considering the stars of the [GetWesternZodiacSign], I nod to myself  the [GetSelectedIngredient_1] on my shelves [GetSelectedIngredient_1_property].
The [GetSelectedIngredient_1] strategically placed in my quarters should suffice.
I will use a combination of elements for this task.
I'll paint my whole castle with the holy symbols! It's the only way!

In this state, I almost do not care about the quality of my potion. Still, while rummaging through my drawers, I can't quite decide on which ingredients to use... The [GetSelectedIngredient_1] [GetSelectedIngredient_1_property], I suppose.

Desperate times call for desperate measures.\n
After spending some time talking with [From.GetTitledFirstName], I have provided enough spiritual guidance to free [From.GetHerHim] of [From.GetHerHis] sinful ways.
After spending some time talking with [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], I have realized the errors of my ways and freed myself of my sinful ways.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] listened to me carefully as I explained to [From.GetHerHim] how to be more virtuous, and [From.GetSheHe] seems to have come out of our discussion a better [From.GetManWoman].

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] clearly explained how [From.GetSheHe] deals with this sometimes unforgiving and stressful life through virtue. Listening to [FromFrom.GetHerHim], I have learned to be more at peace with myself, by being more virtuous.
You know [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to be a sinful person. As such you can provide spiritual guidance to help rid [Root.GetHerHim] of one of [Root.GetHerHis] vices.

Enables you to §Gright-click§! on landed characters within your realm, or relatives, or fellow society members, in order to remove one of their vices. You can only remove a vice that you don't have yourself.
Has a sin that §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! does NOT have
You have noticed how [Root.GetTitledFirstName] sometimes struggles with doing the right thing. You could change that by teaching [Root.GetHerHim] one of your many virtues.
Enables you to §Gright-click§! on landed characters within your realm, relatives, or fellow society members, in order to give them a new virtue. You can only add a virtue that you have yourself.
Does NOT have all the virtues that §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
Your findings have proven to be most fascinating and I am now convinced to follow in your footsteps and immediately convert to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith. However, I have chosen to keep this hidden to avoid prying eyes. I urge you to do the same!

Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
To hide who I am? Never!

The §Y[Root.Location.Religion.GetName]§! people in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. The glory of §Y[Root.Location.Religion.GetRandomGodName]§! calls to me, and I am tempted to convert in secrecy...
The §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! faith of §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! intrigues and fascinates me. I could not embrace it openly, but I am tempted to convert in secrecy...

This character has been revealed as a worshiper of demons.

Night has fallen as I contemplate my latest ritual  there has to be more efficient ways of washing blood off one's clothes...?\n'You must be the [Root.GetDWDemon]', a voice sounds behind me. I spin, only to find a sinister young woman, casually raising a wooden stake. Then she shrugs. 'I can't let evil like you just walk around'.

As I retire to my quarters for the night, I am startled by a shadow, suddenly moving. 'It's been a while', a bright voice muses as a woman steps into the light, weapon raised. 'How did you get into my [Root.GetCapitalHolding]?', I demand to know, but my voice betrays my brave act. 'Your guards are sleeping, my [Root.GetLordLady]... Let's finish this'.

After having snuck out for a late walk with my pet familiar, I make my way back through the gates of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]. Suddenly, shadows surround me and I'm shoved into a wall. A group of angry villagers, their expressions dark in the light of their torches, has gathered around me. Someone yells: 'burn [Root.GetHerHim]!'

I am moving quietly through the gates into the [Root.GetCapitalHolding] tonight, grateful for my disguise. Specific rituals sometimes require me to blend in amongst the common folk. It's become almost second nature  my [GetDWPartyClothes] would be quite the giveaway!\n'There [Root.GetSheHe] is!' someone yells. 'BURN [Root.GetHerHim]!'
The Return of the Demon Hunters

Having just performed a ritual requiring the full moon, it's past midnight when I sneak back into my quarters. Satisfied, I begin washing the blood off my hands. Behind me, someone clears their throat. 'Not so fast, you evil [Root.GetDWDemon]'. I feel the tip of a sword in my back. Another voice mutters: 'Just kill it, brother'.

In honor of [GetDWRandomDemon], I've just finished a new blood ward on my wall. The flickering candlelight makes the intricate pattern glisten, and I back away to admire my art. Suddenly, two shadows grow on the wall, looming over me... The tallest one says, nonchalantly: 'I told you we'd get another shot, brother'.
The Return of the Demon Hunter

In the middle of one of our more carnal rituals, my fellow [Root.GetSocietyRank] suddenly gasps in surprise: 'Did you invite someone else?' Before I have time to reply, a torch is thrown to the floor, sparks singeing my skin. 'We've become [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s madmen, all of us', a darkly clad figure says. 'Die, you demon!'

I still have nightmares about the mysterious demon hunter I once encountered. These days, while I haven't been covering my tracks, the stench of my foul deeds travels further than ever before... Staring at the ceiling in my room, the moonlight suddenly goes out. Leaning over me is a man, weapon raised. 'We meet again'.

I'm not sure what my steward was thinking, letting in a group of holy knights to our [Root.GetCapitalHolding]. They know. Everyone knows! What I am, what I can do... When night falls, I'm not surprised to find myself backed into a dark alley, surrounded by them. 'All [GetDWDemons] must die...!', they cry, riling each other up.

Out surveying my lands, accompanied by a small entourage of servants, I notice a huge cloud of dust being stirred up on the road up ahead... My servants begin to shout and scramble about, as we see a group of knights charging at us  their banner, clearly that of the demon hunting cohort I barely escaped before...
What is the meaning of this? By [GetDWDevil], I will fight you!
You're stubborn! By [GetDWDevil], I will still fight you!
You have no idea who are you are dealing with...!
You pull out your enchanted dagger and jam it into your leg, where you have engraved the emergency symbol.\n
Your attacker staggers away in shock.\n
Your attackers stagger away in shock.\n
Then again, perhaps you could? For a price?
Let's not be hasty...! We can sort this out, with gold?
Woah, woah... Let's be civilized... You seem like businessmen!
I don't suppose you'd be willing to walk out of here, a rich man?
But I'm a rich [Root.GetDWDemon]! Let's make a deal.
No, w-wait, let's talk about it! Is it money you want?
Oh, come on... N-not again. Let's talk about this!
You two again...! How about we sort this out with money?
H-how about I line your pockets with more gold than you can carry?
I'm still a rich [Root.GetDWDemon]! Let's talk about gold!
W-wait! I can give you names! Track down [other_member_to_blame.GetSocietyRank] [other_member_to_blame.GetFirstName] instead!
You pray to [GetDWDevil] that your personal combat skill will save you.\n
In a moment of desperation, you betray your coven.\nThis will increase suspicion of §Y[other_member_to_blame.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
You reach for your money, attempting to bribe your way out.\n
you getting killed in personal combat\n
the woman rolling her eyes at you, before killing you\n
them laughing at your offer, before dragging you off to be burnt at the stake\n
the demon hunter ignoring your offer, before killing you slowly\n
them being defeated, leaving you alone for now\n
them accepting your offer, leaving you alone for now\n

One of my hunting parties caught a great white boar today. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] must have sent us this creature, as it took ten men to bring the beast down, and the effect it has had on my soldiers is clearly the boon I have been waiting for. 'Bards are already composing songs, my [Root.GetLordLady]', a captain tells me.

One of my hunting parties caught a great white boar today. I am told it took ten men to bring the beast down, and rumors of the effect it has had on my soldiers is already spreading through court. 'Bards are already composing songs, my [Root.GetLordLady]', a captain tells me. This certainly goes against my expectations...

I am not sure whether it is a new-found interest in [envisioned_friend.GetEducationSubject], or if there is something about [envisioned_friend.GetHerHis] [envisioned_friend.GetFriendEnjoyableQuirk], but I am really connecting with [envisioned_friend.GetTitledFirstName]. We have been spending more and more time together, and I think [envisioned_friend.GetSheHe] makes me a better [Root.GetTitle].

I am told of an owl having taken up residence under the roofing of our barracks. One of my advisors suggest I make it a pet. But should not my scrying have revealed the symbol of wisdom to me, if this creature is what it was about? 'Do not dwell on this, [Root.GetMasterMistress]', my steward says, handing me the caged bird.
How did I not foresee this event?
The hunters in the area, and the success they have brought, are currently working as an inspiration for nobles and commoners alike.
way of making me really consider what makes a good person
way of challenging me to think outside of the box
appreciation for the small things in life
Go away! I do not have a moment to spare.

During a discussion with some fellow lay members of [This.Society.GetName], I mention the dusty old tomes I store in the library of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]. 'Most of the content is hardly intelligible!', I scoff. The eyes of my peers widen. 'One should not take writings of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] so lightly, my [Root.GetLordLady]'.
Hrm... I shall see to it that the most dangerous ones are destroyed.
You misunderstand! I am getting rid of the book, tonight.
I have actually been arranging for several tomes to be burned!
Actually, I shall cleanse my whole [Root.GetCapitalHolding] of these accursed objects.
This all sounds a bit excessive.
On the other hand, all knowledge can be valuable.
As I retire for the night, I glance at my nightstand... It looks almost as if there is a... There's a thick leather-bound tome, placed right by my bed. What is the meaning of this?
You throw the book out, ordering it burned.\n
I am fairly certain I got rid of this thing...
How long has that been there?
